name: Install_RSFMRI_Motion_Group_Demo
author: AFNI Team
description: Installs and sets up an AFNI InstaCorr demo archive, based on 190 Cambridge subjects from FCON_1000.

inputs.description: Directory where the AFNI_Demo_Motion_Groups will be set up.
inputs.name: Output Directory

output-files.description: Directory where the demo data and scripts are set up.
output-files.name: AFNI Demo Directory
